subtasks: Lift both legs to move forward.
Swing right arm forward.
Swing left arm forward.
Repeat steps 2-3 until reaching the tree.
Face the tree initially.
Step to the left side of the tree.
Walk around the tree, keeping left side towards the tree.
Continue walking until behind the tree.
Step to the right side.
Walk back around the tree to the front.

tasks.task: Remove jaws from around the tree.
subtasks: Walk towards the tree trunk.
Approach closer to the tree.
Attempt to open jaws by moving them apart.
If unsuccessful, use hands or tool to free jaws.
Once cleared, back away from the tree.
Approach the fallen log.
Squat down slightly.
Take a running start.
Leap over the log using legs and arms.
Land on the other side, ensuring balance.

tasks.task: Pull a tarped load across a trail.
subtasks: Lift edges of the tarp on either side.
Grasp the tarp near the raised edges.
Drag the tarp and load along the trail.
Adjust the tarp to maintain control.
Identify the desired placement for the log.
Approach the log.
Grasp the log with both hands.
Brace legs for pushing.
Push the log towards the desired spot.
Release the log once placed.

tasks.task: Check and secure loose bark on a tree.
subtasks: Walk up to the tree trunk.
Inspect the trunk for loose bark.
Locate any loose or peeling bark.
Remove or secure the loose bark with rope or binding.

tasks.task: Remove an object stuck in a tarp.
subtasks: Approach the tarp with the stuck object.
Reach under the tarp to find the object.
Use hands to grip the object.
Pull the object out from the tarp, avoiding tearing.
Dispose of or handle the extracted object.
Take a few steps backward in the opposite direction.
Continue walking away.
Stop and look back.
Wave or nod towards the viewer.
Resume walking out of view.
